timeline.description: Cloud Computing is widely adopted in production.

entries.title: Cloud Computing
entries.description: Emerging technology for scalable and distributed computing.

timeline.description: 5G is actively being adopted for faster connectivity.

entries.title: 5G
entries.description: Fifth-generation technology for broadband cellular networks.

timeline.description: Quantum Computing is still in the trial phase.

entries.title: Quantum Computing
entries.description: A new area of computing based on quantum mechanics.

timeline.description: Blockchain is under assessment for its future uses.

entries.title: Blockchain
entries.description: A decentralized ledger technology that powers cryptocurrencies.

timeline.description: Agile Development is widely used in modern software development.

entries.title: Agile Development
entries.description: An iterative approach to software development focused on collaboration.

timeline.description: DevOps is actively adopted for continuous integration and delivery.

entries.title: DevOps
entries.description: A set of practices that automates and integrates software development and IT operations.

timeline.description: Waterfall is still being trialed in certain projects.

entries.title: Waterfall
entries.description: A sequential design process commonly used in software development.

timeline.description: Six Sigma is under assessment for its effectiveness in software development.

entries.title: Six Sigma
entries.description: A set of techniques for process improvement and reduction of defects.

timeline.description: React is widely adopted as a front-end framework.

entries.title: React
entries.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

timeline.description: Vue.js is actively adopted for modern web development.

entries.title: Vue.js
entries.description: A progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.

timeline.description: Angular is still in the trial phase for some teams.

entries.title: Angular
entries.description: A platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.

timeline.description: Ember.js is under assessment due to its complexity.

entries.title: Ember.js
entries.description: An opinionated framework for building ambitious web applications.

timeline.description: Python is widely used for data science, web development, and automation.

entries.title: Python
entries.description: A high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity.

timeline.description: TypeScript is actively adopted to enhance JavaScript development.

entries.title: TypeScript
entries.description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static types.

timeline.description: Go is being trialed for its concurrency and performance features.

entries.title: Go
entries.description: A statically typed compiled language designed for simplicity and efficiency.

timeline.description: Perl is under assessment as its use declines.

entries.title: Perl
entries.description: A high-level, interpreted language known for its string manipulation capabilities.

rings.name: USE
rings.description: Technologies that are widely used in production

rings.name: TRIAL
rings.description: Technologies that are being trialed or tested

rings.name: ASSESS
rings.description: Technologies under assessment or should be avoided
